method.name: is_boundary_visibility_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the boundary visibility extension is supported.

method.name: is_boundary_visible
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the boundary is currently visible.

method.name: set_boundary_visible
method.description: Set the visibility of the boundary. [b]Note:[/b] Boundary visibility can only be set to false when passthrough is active.

signal.name: openxr_meta_boundary_visibility_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the boundary visibility state has changed.
